subject: Attention Women  Do you qualify for debt relief programs?
body:
THIS EMAIL IS A COMMERCIAL SOLICITATION.
      This email was sent by a 3rd party on behalf of DebtFreeWomen. DebtFreeWomen 
      only supports permission-based emails. If you want us to notify the 3rd 
      party company who sent you this email to stop sending emails about DebtFreeWomen, 
      click here. 
      Unfortunately, we cannot provide assistance with emails that are not sent 
      on behalf of DebtFreeWomen.
      DebFreeWomen, PMB 219. P.O. Box 200255, Austin, TX 78720 




Use this link to be automatically removed from any future offers


If you do not wish to receive any more offers from via e-mail, please write us with your removal request.  Customer Service 560- A F ST #438 Grants Pass, OR 97528.Please note: It may take up to 3 days for your name to be removed from our list.
